item.title: Homogeneous Coordinate In Rendering
item.description: Homogeneous coordinate is a coordinate system that mapping coordinates in $R^n$ space to $R^{n+1}$ space, there are many methods of mapping but the most commonly used one is using $(x_1,y_1,z_1)=(w x_2, w y_2, w z_2)$, and in $R^{n+1}$ space we will have $(x_2,y_2,z_2,\lambda)$.
